name: Call of duty 2 (itch)
description:
System Requirements

CPU Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Dual-Core) CPU Speed: 1.8 GHz. Memory: 512 MB RAM. Hard Disk Space: 3.42 GB.

Multi-player Requirements:

  • Internet (TCP/IP) and LAN (TCP/IP) play supported.
  • Internet play requires broadband connection and latest drivers.
  • LAN play requires network interface card and latest drivers.

Call of Duty 2 is a first-person shooter that has a single-player story mode and a multiplayer mode. The player takes on the roles of several Allied protagonists in specific missions during World War II.
